text: Eastern Commodities such as paper or black powder. Can be sold to the Western part of the world, or can be used to make better equipment for the troops.
Western commodities such as cloth or weapons. Can be sold to the Eastern part of the world, or can be used to make better equipment for the troops.
Sacrificing [[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]Slaves to Chaos Undivided unlocks additional Gifts of Chaos.
Sacrificing [[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]Slaves to Khorne unlocks additional Gifts of Chaos.
Offering [[img:icon_grimoires]][[/img]]Grimoires to Chaos Undivided unlocks additional Gifts of Chaos.
Sacrificing [[img:icon_grimoires]][[/img]]Grimoires to Tzeentch unlocks additional Gifts of Chaos.
Any action that grants Souls – such as fighting battles and razing settlements – will also allow contribute to Archaon's Power
As you win more battle, the meter will charge and your force will become more powerful. But be wary though, single defeat or withdraw of Arbaal will set this value to 0
